greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into odd parts in which the largest part occurs only once.
mathematica: Table[SeriesCoefficient[Sum[x^(2 k - 1)/Product[1 - x^(2 i - 1), {i, k - 1}], {k, 0, n}] , {x, 0, n}], {n, 57}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 16 2016 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n)=if(n<3, n==1, n-=2; polcoeff( prod(k=1, n, 1+x^k, 1+x*O(x^n)), n))} /* _Michael Somos_, May 28 2006 */
results.author: _Emeric Deutsch_, Mar 13 2006
